title: Statement by the Press Secretary on H.R. 5146 | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Press Secretary


For Immediate Release
May 14, 2010

 



Statement by the Press Secretary on H.R. 5146




On Friday, May 14, 2010, the President signed into law:
H.R. 5146, which eliminates an automatic adjustment in pay for Members of Congress during FY 2011.
